content.rendered:
Miren is the Head of Recruitment for Regent College London.

He graduated from the University of Bath in 2019 and has a passion for giving Home, EU and International students the opportunity to study in the UK. He gives specialist information, advice and guidance (IAG) based on market factors, cultural and academic backgrounds, for their academic progression and aspirations.

His motivation, teamwork, commitment, drive, and Customer Relationship Management (CRM) skills are key in the implementation and improvement of processes and identification of exactly what a prospective student needs to enrol onto their chosen course, and help achieve the company’s commercial goals.

Miren is also Business Relationship Manager for Thinking into Character (TiC). He is a big believer in setting worthy goals and life-long learning for the achievement of growth and self-fulfilment.

Miren has represented Great Britain at various International tennis competitions across Europe, Asia and Africa, and in his spare time currently coaches tennis professionally.
